label: ProductBatchCertificate
comment: A piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence that a product batch has met required criteria.

datatypeProperties.comment: A prominent attribute or aspect of a product.
The process of certifying that a certain product has passed performance and quality assurance tests, or qualification requirements stipulated in regulations.

referencedBy.comment: A piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence that a product batch has met required criteria.
